title: Sarah Silverman
summary: Sarah Kate Silverman[1] (born December 1, 1970)[1] is an American comedian, actress, and writer. Her comedy addresses social taboos and controversial topics, including racism, sexism, homophobia, politics, and religion, sometimes having her comic character endorse them in a satirical or deadpan fashion.[2][3] She has won two Primetime Emmy Awards for her work on television.
